translation.en: [men chanting in Latin] Thus has it always been, and thus shall it ever be.
translation.zh: 事情一向如此 也将永远如此

translation.en: [Neil] "Do not weep for me For I have not gone"
translation.zh: “不要为我哭泣 因为我还没有离去

translation.en: "I am the wind that shakes the mighty oak"
translation.zh: 我是撼动参天大树的狂风

translation.en: "I am the gentle rain That falls upon your face"
translation.zh: 我是落在你脸上的细雨

translation.en: "I am the spring flower That pushes through the dark earth"
"I am the chuckling laughter Of the mountain stream"
[vicar] Yea, though I walk through the valley
translation.zh: 我虽然行过死阴的幽谷

translation.en: of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil.
Thy rod and thy staff, they comfort me.
translation.zh: 你用牧杖引导我 用牧竿保护我

translation.en: We commit our brother to the ground.

translation.zh: 不是 化装舞会服而已
我也是 穿燕尾服扮企鹅

translation.en: So, seeing as we're both here at this ridiculous charity party,
translation.zh: 既然我们在这场可笑的慈善派对遇到

translation.en: would you allow me to buy you a drink?
Have whatever you want. My treat.
translation.zh: 想喝什么随便拿 我请客

translation.en: in 11 hours, I'll be on a plane back to base.
translation.zh: 再过11小时 我就要坐飞机回基地了

translation.en: Well, in that case, we'd better make the most of the time that we have,
translation.zh:
既然如此
我们最好充分利用现在的时间

-你没事吧？
-是的 谢谢 谢恩

-基尔斯警探
-玛雅 这东西太好吃了

translation.en: What, you've come for the catering? Or you've found my husband's killer?
translation.zh:
你是来品尝美食的？还是来告诉我
你找到杀害我丈夫的凶手了？
是乔的妈妈邀请我来的

translation.en: [Maya] Oh. Well, you'd think a psychiatrist would know better.
translation.zh:
好吧 还以为心理医生
能更懂人情世故呢

translation.en: Not today, but there's some things I need to follow up on, about the attack.
translation.zh:
今天不说这些
我需要再跟你谈谈袭击的事

translation.en: Look, I have given you three statements, and you're no closer to catching them.
translation.zh:
听着 我已经给过你三份口供了
但你还没抓到他们

translation.en: Why did you invite that detective?
translation.zh: 你为什么要邀请那位警探呢？

translation.en: I wanted him to see who Joe was.
translation.zh: 我想让他看看乔是什么样的人

translation.en: That he was loved by his brothers and sister.
translation.zh: 看看他的兄弟姐妹都很爱他

translation.en: That he grew up in this big house
translation.zh: 看看他从小到大住的大房子
他在这里度过了整个童年

translation.en: I lost the love of my life.
There's something more going on with you.
translation.zh: 你身边还发生了其他变故

translation.en: I don't want to push you today, but I think you should get help.
translation.zh:
我今天不想逼你
但我觉得你应该去找医生

translation.en: There's so much you're dealing with. First, you lose your sister.
translation.zh:
你要处理的情绪太多了
你先是失去了姐姐

translation.en: I'd better attend to the guests.
I must have told them ten times, play The Doors,
translation.zh:
我跟他们说过不下十遍了
播放大门乐队的歌

translation.en: [in posh voice] Play Nirvana? At a funeral?
translation.zh: 播放涅槃乐队的歌？在葬礼上吗？

translation.en: -Do you know how much they spent? -Go on.
translation.zh:
-你知道他们花费多少办葬礼吗？
-说说看

translation.en: The coffin cost more than your car.
translation.zh: 那具棺材比你的车都贵

translation.en: I don't want to leave you.
Look, I know you think you will,
translation.zh: 听着 我知道你觉得自己会没事

translation.en: but I don't care if it's 3:00 in the morning,
translation.zh: 但我不在乎是凌晨三点

translation.en: if you have a wobble… yeah?
translation.zh: 还是你犹豫不决时 打给我好吗？

translation.en: It rotates photos of you and your family.
translation.zh: 可以循环播放你和家人的照片

translation.en: I've already pre-loaded some of you, Joe, Lily, and the family.
translation.zh:
我已经提前存入了一些你们的照片
有乔 莉莉 还有其他家人

translation.en: Except, that's not all it is.
translation.zh: 不过 它的功能不仅如此

translation.en: [chuckles] Do you want to see that funky move again? Please.
translation.zh:
-你想再看一次这些时髦舞步吗？
-拜托

translation.en: Well, you can. It's all caught on here, on a secret camera,
translation.zh:
你可以的 刚刚的一切
都被这里的隐藏摄像头拍下来了
只要有动静 就会自动拍摄

translation.en: Why have you got me a secret camera?
translation.zh: 你为什么要送我隐藏摄像头呢？

translation.en: So you can keep an eye on Lily when you're not here.
translation.zh: 这样你不在家时 也可以看到莉莉了

-她跟伊莎贝拉在一起时吗？
-没错 保姆摄像头
我相信伊莎贝拉是好人

translation.en: but what harm does it do to keep an eye on her?
translation.zh: 但盯着点她又有什么坏处呢？

translation.en: Eva, her family's and Joe's go way back.
translation.zh: 伊娃 她和乔 他们两家是老交情了

translation.en: Well, I am putting it in her playroom.
translation.zh: 好吧 我去把相框放到她的游戏室了

translation.en: Ready for your next lesson? -Yeah, can't wait. -Let's go.
translation.zh:
-准备好上下一课了吗？我们走吧
-是的 都等不及了

translation.en: Okay, you can take her up today.
translation.zh: 好的 今天由你来驾驶她上天

translation.en: If you'd like to take a slight turn to the left.
translation.zh: 你可以稍微向左转一点

translation.en: Right. Keep-- Keep your eyes on the horizon.
translation.zh: 是的 眼睛盯着地平线

translation.en: That's a nasty graze to his elbow there.
translation.zh: 身体一枪没中 手肘擦伤严重啊

translation.en: Is that what they teach military police? -I was aiming for his elbow. -Ah.
translation.zh:
-这就是他们教出来的军事警察吗？
-我瞄准的就是他的手肘

translation.en: No. Wouldn't want to embarrass you.
translation.zh: 不了 我不想让你难堪

translation.en: How long have you been back at work?
What am I supposed to do?
Sit at home, stare at a wall?
translation.zh: 坐在家里 傻傻盯着墙吗？
我还在服丧期 谢恩

-我们需要一些正常的生活
-好吧

translation.en: Listen, me and the guys, we were talking…
translation.zh: 听着 我和其他人 我们在说…

translation.en: -Oh, go on. -How about we come over this weekend?
translation.zh:
-说说看
-我们这周末去你家怎么样？

translation.en: Nothing crazy. Just a few drinks. Keep you company.
translation.zh: 不做什么疯狂的事 就喝几杯 陪陪你

translation.en: So, it's too soon for me to be back in work,
translation.zh: 所以说 我现在回来上班还太早

translation.en: -but not for a piss-up, hmm? -[buzzer sounds]
-Hi! -Hi, Maya. Hi. Has everything been all right?
translation.zh:
-嗨 一切都好吗？
-嗨 玛雅

translation.en: Of course. We've had fun, haven't we, Lily? Yeah?
translation.zh:
当然 我们玩得很开心
对吗 莉莉？对吗？

translation.en: -[Izabella] Why don't you show Mummy? -Go on. Go on.
translation.zh:
-为什么不拿给妈咪看看呢？
-去吧

translation.en: -[Lily] Come. Come with me. -[Maya] You go in. One minute.
translation.zh: 跟我来 你先去 我马上就来

translation.en: -[Lily giggles] -She's been talking about heaven, so I-- Yeah, no, it's fine. It's fine.
translation.zh:
-她一直在说天堂 所以我…
-是的 没事

translation.en: It's fine. I'm going to, uh, look at these amazing angels.
translation.zh: 没事的 我去看看那些神奇的天使

translation.en: Right, breakfast. Go and sit down.
translation.zh: 来吧 吃早餐了 去坐好

translation.en: Go and sit in your chair.
Hi, Judith. Listen, I'm just rushing off to work.
translation.zh: 嗨 朱迪丝 听着 我正赶着去上班

translation.en: I thought you could come over to Farnwood this weekend with Lily.
translation.zh:
我想这周末
你可以跟莉莉一起来法恩伍德

translation.en: That's kind of you, um, but I can't this weekend.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的好意 但我去不了 我已经跟朋友约好了

translation.en: -I've arranged to see friends. -She spent a lot of time here, Maya,
translation.zh: 但我去不了 我已经跟朋友约好了 你不在家时 玛雅 她经常住在这里
你不在家时 玛雅 她经常住在这里

translation.en: I know you're not used to being a full-time mother,
translation.zh: 你还没习惯做全职妈妈
但孩子们需要自己的日常生活

translation.en: Listen, why don't I call you later and we can arrange another day?
translation.zh:
听着 我晚点打给你
我们再安排一天吧？
好的 晚点打给我吧

translation.en: I'm only thinking about what's best for Lily.
translation.zh: 我只是在考虑怎样做对莉莉是最好的

translation.en: Did you see Daddy yesterday when I wasn't here?
translation.zh: 昨天我不在家时 你看到爸爸了吗？

translation.en: He came over, and he-- and he gave you a cuddle, and he sat you on his lap?
translation.zh:
他走过来 给了你一个拥抱
然后让你坐在他腿上了吗？

translation.en: Okay. All right, Mommy's being silly. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 好吧 妈咪在胡说八道 抱歉

translation.en: I need to show you something.
-You're spying on me? -Right, just watch, watch.
translation.zh:
-你在监视我？
-是的 看着就好

translation.en: -How do you explain this? -I don't know what you mean.
translation.zh:
-你怎么解释？
-我不明白你什么意思

translation.en: That man there, you saw him. You saw who that was?
translation.zh:
这个人 你看到他了
你看到他是谁了吗？

translation.en: -It's Joe! How the hell can that be? -Please, Mrs. Burkett, you're scaring me!
translation.zh:
-是乔！怎么可能？
-拜托 伯克特太太 你吓到我了！

-他已经死了 伊莎贝拉
-你弄疼我了

translation.en: He's dead, and he's there on the camera whilst you were in the house.
translation.zh:
他已经死了
你在家里时 他却出现在镜头前了

translation.en: It's all right, darling. Just go back in and watch your show.
translation.zh: 没事的 亲爱的 回去看你的节目吧

translation.en: Go on. It's all right. It's okay.
translation.zh: 去吧 没事的 没关系的

-胡椒喷雾？
-是的 是我保姆干的

translation.en: No. No, I'm a gifted comedian.
translation.zh: 不是 我是个天才喜剧演员

translation.en: Nothing warms up a crowd like the "pepper spray nanny" routine.
translation.zh:
没有比“胡椒喷雾保姆”
更好的暖场段子了

translation.en: All right, Maya. That's a serious offense.
translation.zh: 好吧 玛雅 这是很严重的罪行

translation.en: Can I ask what prompted it?
translation.zh: 我能问一下她这样做的原因吗？

translation.en: I saw something on my nanny cam, and I challenged her about it.
translation.zh:
我在保姆摄像头上
看到一些东西 就问了她几句
好吧 你看到什么了？

translation.en: -Gone? -[sputtering] Yeah, the SD card is gone.

translation.zh:
-在她向你喷胡椒喷雾后吗？
-是的

translation.en: -It was an old tape. -No, it wasn't. It was from yesterday.
translation.zh:
-一段旧录像
-不 那是昨天录的

translation.en: -You know that-- You know that can't be. -He was wearing his green shirt.
translation.zh:
你知道这是不可能的 他当时穿着他的绿衬衫
我在衣橱里没找到 鞋子也是如此

translation.en: That's not in his wardrobe. Or his shoes.
translation.zh:
他当时穿着他的绿衬衫
我在衣橱里没找到 鞋子也是如此

translation.en: Are you sure it was Joe, Maya?
translation.zh: 你确定那是乔吗 玛雅？

translation.en: He went to Lily, and she cuddled him.
translation.zh: 他走向莉莉 莉莉抱了他

translation.en: -Grief can do funny things. -It's not grief.
translation.zh:
-悲伤会跟人开玩笑
-不是悲伤造成的
听着 我没事 我只是…

translation.en: -[clears throat] Okay. -You wanted to ask me a few questions?

translation.zh: 是的 如果你现在可以的话

translation.en: In your original statement on the night of the attack,
translation.zh: 在袭击当晚的原始口供中

translation.en: you said two masked youths appeared in the park on scramble bikes.
translation.zh:
你说有两名戴着面具的年轻人
骑着摩托车出现在公园里

translation.en: And then you said they stopped in front of you
translation.zh: 然后你说他们停在了你面前

translation.en: and attempted to grab your bag.
I resisted. A fight broke out.
translation.zh: 我反抗了 发生了打斗

translation.en: Um, one of them had hold of my bag, he wouldn't let go, and I, uh, was pushed.
translation.zh:
其中一人抓着我的包
不肯放手 我被推了一下

translation.en: They were demanding that Joe handed over his wallet, and he wouldn't.
translation.zh: 他们让乔交出他的钱包 他不肯

translation.en: Then, all of a sudden, out of nowhere,
translation.zh: 然后 突然 不知从哪里

translation.en: I tried to call for help.
But before I could, I just heard…
translation.zh: 但还没等我开口 我就听到…

translation.en: By the time I got to Joe…
Besides a very detailed description of the suspects,
translation.zh: 除了对嫌疑人的详细描述

translation.en: you were able to tell us that the youth in the red Nike trainers
translation.zh:
你还有能力告诉我们
那名穿红色耐克运动鞋的年轻人

当时拿的是一把9毫米口径的
格洛克17型手枪 这一点…

translation.en: To identify a weapon like that.

translation.zh: 我以前有一把 在海外

translation.en: As you know, despite never finding the weapon itself,
translation.zh: 如你所知 尽管一直没找到凶器

translation.en: we recovered three bullets from your husband's body
translation.zh: 但我们在你丈夫身上找到三颗子弹

translation.en: and three cases from the scene consistent with a Glock 17.
translation.zh:
在现场找到三枚弹壳
确实是由格洛克17型手枪射出

translation.en: Now, you own guns, don't you, Maya?
translation.zh: 你是有枪的 对吗 玛雅？

translation.en: Do you keep any of them here?
No one can get their hands on them, especially Lily.
translation.zh: 没人能接触到 尤其是莉莉

translation.en: Well, how do you open it?
That's, uh, quite the collection. Does anyone else have access to these?
translation.zh:
藏品真多呀
还有谁能打开你的柜子吗？

translation.en: No. Well, Joe used to. But…
translation.zh: 没了 乔生前可以 但是…

translation.en: -[Sami] Is this your only handgun? -Yep. The only one.
translation.zh: 你只有这一把手枪吗？ 是的 只有这一把

translation.en: And it's legally registered as deactivated.
As I'm sure you already know.
So shall we stop playing games and you tell me what it is that you want?
translation.zh:
我们不要再兜圈子了
跟我说你到底想要什么吧？

translation.en: is to go away and test it. Go on.
translation.zh: 去检测一下这把枪 来吧

translation.en: -What, you think I killed my husband? -No, Maya.
translation.zh:
-怎么 你觉得是我杀了我丈夫吗？
-不 玛雅

translation.en: You buried him. I was there.
translation.zh: 你埋葬他时 我就在现场

translation.en: So he wasn't on the nanny cam.
translation.zh: 所以他不会出现在保姆摄像头里

translation.en: Hiya, sweetheart. How was your day?
translation.zh: 嗨 亲爱的 今天过得好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, good. Well, I say good.
translation.zh: 是啊 很好 我觉得很好

translation.en: I had a six-year-old say "bellend" this morning.
translation.zh:
今天早上
一个六岁的孩子竟然说出“混蛋”
不得不给他父母打电话

translation.en: So, tonight, you got your dancing shoes ready?
translation.zh: 你准备好今晚的舞鞋了吗？
好呢 别忘了 晚上六点

translation.en: Yeah? And it's side together, side tap, side together. Yes?
translation.zh:
好吗？侧并步 侧点地
侧并步 记住了吗？

translation.en: [man] And there's a board members' call at 2:45.
translation.zh: 2点45分有董事会成员电话会议

translation.en: -It's in your diary. -Mm. Joy of joys.
translation.zh: 在你的日程里 乐意之至
重新考虑我的提议了吗？

translation.en: I need to ask you something about Joe.
translation.zh: 我想问你一些关于乔的事

translation.en: When you, uh… when you went to see him…
Why on earth would you ask me that?
translation.zh: 你为什么要问我这种问题？

translation.en: "What did he look like?" What sort of a question is that, Maya?
translation.zh: “他是什么样的？” 这是什么问题？

translation.en: Because I never saw his body.
translation.zh: 因为我从没见过他的尸体

translation.en: Maya, please. I urge you to think again about counseling.
translation.zh:
玛雅 求你了
我劝你再考虑一下心理咨询

translation.en: I have an excellent colleague at the clinic. Specializes in grief.
translation.zh:
我在诊所有一位优秀的同事
专攻亲人离世造成的悲伤过度

translation.en: Please, just tell me what he looked like.
translation.zh: 拜托 跟我说说 他当时是什么样的

translation.en: -There's no stigma attached to it, Maya. -Judith.
translation.zh:
-这并不丢人 玛雅
-朱迪丝

translation.en: He looked like what he was.

translation.zh:
-好吧 谢谢你
-好的 伙计
再见 好吧 谢谢 是的

translation.en: [chuckles dryly] Yeah, from nowhere. It jumped out, I swerved.
translation.zh:
是的 不知从哪里跳出来的
我赶紧打方向盘

translation.en: Next thing I know, I've hit a fence.
translation.zh: 下一秒 就撞栅栏上了

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Yeah, yeah, yeah. Not a scratch, unlike the car.
translation.zh:
-你没事吧？
-是的 毫发无伤 那辆车就不然了

-可以找人接手我的工作吗？
-可能吧

translation.en: But, Sami, I'm just going to ask you this straight.
translation.zh: 但是萨米 我要直截了当地问你

translation.en: -Oh, come on, Pam. -You've had your challenges.
translation.zh: 拜托 帕姆 你遇到过挑战的

translation.en: And I know you've risen to meet them, but we're all capable of--
translation.zh:
我知道你奋起迎接挑战了
但我们都有能力…

translation.en: One thousand, two hundred seventy-eight days sober.
Do you know how long that is? Nearly three and a half years.
translation.zh: 你知道这有多久吗？将近三年半了

translation.en: Oh, come on, Sami. Are you sure the wedding's not bringing back
translation.zh: 得了吧 萨米 你确定这次婚礼

translation.en: unhappy memories of what happened last time?
translation.zh: 没让你想起上次婚礼的不愉快吗？

translation.en: It was a complete freak event.
translation.zh: 就是一件十足的突发事件

translation.en: I'm partnering you up on the Joe Burkett case.
translation.zh:
我要给你安排搭档
一起调查伯克特的案子

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. Come on.
Marty McGreggor. He's young, he's bright,
translation.zh: 马蒂·麦格雷戈 年轻又聪明

translation.en: and he'll benefit from the wisdom of an older man.
translation.zh: 他会从前辈的智慧中受益匪浅的

translation.en: So I'm being babysat by a child?
translation.zh: 所以要让一个小孩给我当保姆吗？

translation.en: -[Sami groans] -See it as someone to help you avoid cats.
translation.zh: 把他当成是一个帮你躲猫的人

translation.en: [Marty] Oh my God, this is-- this is so exciting.
translation.zh: 天啊 这太激动人心了

translation.en: Sir, I'm really stoked to be…
You know, I think we'll be a really good team.
translation.zh: 我想我们会成为很好的搭档

translation.en: -Oh God. -I think-- Are you-- Are you stoked?
Just here. Yeah. Yes, yes, I'm stoked. Very stoked.
translation.zh: 是的 我很激动 非常激动

translation.en: This is where the attack happened. Do you know who Margrete was?
translation.zh:
这里就是发生袭击的地方
你知道玛格丽特是谁吗？

translation.en: The ruler of Denmark, Norway, and Sweden in the 1300s.
translation.zh:
她是十四世纪丹麦
挪威和瑞典的统治者
为什么英国的公园里有一个角落

translation.en: And this is where Joe Burkett was murdered on the night of the 12th.
translation.zh:
12日晚上
乔·伯克特就是在这里被谋杀的

translation.en: The wife's statement's all we have to go on.
translation.zh: 他妻子的口供是我们唯一的线索

translation.en: You know she left the army under controversial circumstances?
translation.zh:
你知道她是在有争议的情况下
离开军队的吗？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. It was a kind of a whistleblower thing, right?
translation.zh: 是的 存在告密行为 对吗？

translation.en: Yeah, she killed innocent civilians. Corey the Whistle leaked the details.
translation.zh:
她杀害了无辜的平民
告密人科里泄露了细节

translation.en: -People wanted her in prison. I remember. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-我记得人们想把她关进监狱
-是的

translation.en: And then today, she claimed to see her dead husband alive.
translation.zh:
然后今天 她跟我说
她看到自己死去的丈夫还活着

translation.en: She lost her sister and her husband in a short period of time,
translation.zh: 她在短时间内失去了姐姐和丈夫
所以产生幻觉了 但是…

translation.en: if she did do it, maybe she's trying to show us that she's losing it,
translation.zh:
如果这是她干的
也许她在向我们表明她正在失去理智

translation.en: you know, to plead diminished responsibility.
translation.zh: 你懂的 以精神失常做无罪辩护

translation.en: Well… does she have a motive?
Well, you learn motive isn't always clear.
translation.zh: 你知道的 动机并不总是那么明显

translation.en: Oh, well, uh, rich family. I mean, Burkett Global Enterprises. Kerching!
translation.zh:
有钱人家 我是说
伯克特跨国公司 超级有钱！

translation.en: Is she in line for a big payout?
translation.zh: 她会得到一大笔赔偿吗？

translation.en: But most of the money goes into trust for their daughter,
translation.zh:
但大部分钱都转到
为他们的女儿设立的信托基金中了

translation.en: but that was all pre-agreed years ago.
translation.zh: 这是几年前就约定好的

translation.en: So, well, maybe it is exactly as she says, you know.
translation.zh: 或许她说的是真的 你懂的

translation.en: Which is why we need a ballistics check on her gun.
translation.zh: 所以我们需要对她的枪进行弹道检测

translation.en: Oh, but yeah. Okay, I'll get on it. [chuckles]
Yeah. And while you're there, chase them up on the bullets.
translation.zh:
是的 你到那里时
跟进一下子弹的情况

translation.en: I requested a matching review to see
if the killer's gun could be linked to any other incidents.
translation.zh: 看看凶手的枪是否与其他案件有牵连

-弹道 子弹 遵命 长官
-嘿 哇

translation.en: Don't. Never-- Never do that again. Just…
translation.zh: 别这样 别再这样了 只是…

translation.en: Oh, it's, uh, chocolate, whey protein, spinach, and a little bit of banana.
translation.zh:
这里面有巧克力
乳清蛋白 菠菜 还有一点香蕉

translation.en: -You should… -I should. Yeah, okay, well, I'll…
-I'll see you-- I'll see you back at-- -Yep.
Hello, you reach Izabella. Please leave a message and I'll get back to you.
translation.zh:
你好 我是伊莎贝拉
有事请留言 我会尽快打给你

translation.en: Have you seen Izabella up your way?
Uh, yeah, I think I saw her come back a little while ago.
translation.zh: 是的 我刚才好像看到她回来了

translation.en: -Think she's at the house in the grounds. -All right. Okay. Thanks. Bye.
translation.zh:
-她应该在院子的房子里
-好吧 谢谢 再见

translation.en: -Hi, Lily. Hi, Auntie Maya. -Hi, Dan. We haven't seen you in ages.
translation.zh:
-嗨 莉莉 嗨 玛雅阿姨
-嗨 丹 我们好久没见到你了

translation.en: -Sorry, Auntie Maya. -[chuckles] Is your dad in?
translation.zh:
-抱歉 玛雅阿姨
-你爸爸在里面吗？

-是的 在里面呢
-那进去吧

translation.en: [Maya] There you go. Go and find Abby.
Do you mind looking after Lily for me for an hour? I need to speak to someone.
translation.zh:
你介意照顾莉莉一小时吗？
我需要找个人谈谈

translation.en: I'll come and see you today. Maybe second half.
translation.zh: 我今天会去看你 也许去看下半场

translation.en: -You don't need to. -No, I want to.
translation.zh:
-你不用这样的
-没有 我想去的

translation.en: -How are you getting there? -[Eddie] How do you think?
What, with that in your hand?

translation.zh: 我只喝了一瓶 没问题的

translation.en: I don't drink and drive, Maya. It's one drink.
translation.zh: 我不会醉驾 玛雅 一瓶没问题

translation.en: It's bad enough that the kids are living in the house that their mum was killed in.
translation.zh:
孩子们住在妈妈遇害的房子里
已经够糟糕了

translation.en: -I'm dealing with it. -Saying that for weeks.
translation.zh:
-我在处理了
-你已经这样说了好几周了

translation.en: Well, maybe you'll understand when you start to throw Joe's stuff.
translation.zh:
也许等你开始扔乔的东西时
你就会明白了

translation.en: Know how it feels now, don't you?
translation.zh: 你知道现在是什么感觉了 是吧？

translation.en: -My wife, my problem. -Yeah, and my sister, Eddie.
translation.zh:
-我的妻子 我的问题
-是啊 那也是我的姐姐 爱迪

translation.en: I know I wasn't here as much as she'd have liked.
translation.zh:
我知道我没能
像她希望的那样经常来这里

translation.en: But you were off saving the world?
translation.zh: 但你在外面拯救世界呢 是吧？

translation.en: She hated you being away. You know that.
translation.zh: 她讨厌你离开 你知道的

translation.en: She was worried every shithole conflict you went to would be your last,
translation.zh:
每次你去参加什么狗屁战斗
她都担心会一去无回

translation.en: and one day she'd get a call telling her as much.
translation.zh:
害怕有一天
她会接到一通报丧的电话

translation.en: But it was the other way around.
I've been, uh, updating Judith. How's the nanny situation?
translation.zh:
我一直在跟朱迪丝汇报进展
保姆那边情况如何？

translation.en: Well, I'm going to see Izabella now to talk about it.
translation.zh: 我现在要去找伊莎贝拉谈谈

translation.en: -Why she took my SD card. -Come on, Maya.
translation.zh:
-她为什么拿走我的SD卡
-拜托 玛雅

translation.en: But she saw what I saw.
translation.zh: 但她看见我看到的画面了

translation.en: And now she won't even speak to me.
-Do you want me to come with you? -No, thanks.
translation.zh:
-要我跟你一起去吗？
-不用了 谢谢
伊莎贝拉 我是玛雅

translation.en: Will you just open the door?
Please. I just need to talk to you about Joe.
translation.zh: 拜托 我只是想跟你谈谈乔的事

translation.en: I'm sorry I grabbed you. I panicked. Just…
translation.zh: 对不起 之前抓着你不放 我是慌了

translation.en: Oh yeah, they, uh-- they changed it. Don't know why.
translation.zh: 是哦 他们给我换车了 不知道为什么
看起来像青蛙克米特的呕吐物

translation.en: Feel free to walk home after dance lesson.
translation.zh: 上完舞蹈课 你也可以走回家

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. I-- I don't know the-- -I'll close up late.
translation.zh:
-我很抱歉 我不知道…
-我晚点关门

translation.en: -[teacher] Two, three, four. Slide. Slide. -♪ You're the most supreme ♪
translation.zh: 二 三 四 滑过去

translation.en: We've got our work cut out.
[coach] Don't give the ball away. Chase it. Chase it. Keep moving. Come on.
translation.zh: 别把球传丢了 去追球 继续跑 加油

translation.en: -Go on, Abby! Go on! -[coach] Pretend it's a donut, Abby.
translation.zh:
-加油 艾比！加油！
-假装那是甜甜圈 艾比

translation.en: That'll get you moving. My granny could play better than you.
translation.zh:
那会让你动起来的
我奶奶踢得都比你好

translation.en: Move it. Faster, you bloody donkeys! Come on! Faster! Talk to each other! Come on!
translation.zh:
跑起来 快点 你们这些笨货！
快点！要互相沟通！加油！

translation.en: [coach] Chase it! Quicker. Quicker. Come on!
Maybe ease up on the cakes. Yeah? Your bulk's not helping.
translation.zh:
也许可以少吃点蛋糕
是吧？你的大块头没有什么用

-嘿！教练
-比赛正进行到一半呢

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm Maya Stern. I'm Abby's aunt. -Maya, don't.
translation.zh:
是啊 我是玛雅·斯特恩
我是艾比的阿姨 -玛雅 不要
-是啊 我知道你是谁 机长

translation.en: [coach] Yeah, I know who you are, Captain.
translation.zh:
-玛雅 不要
-是啊 我知道你是谁 机长

translation.en: They're kids. I'm ex-forces, and I've heard sergeant majors go easier.
translation.zh:
他们还是孩子 我是退伍军人
军士长都没有你严厉

translation.en: -You can't speak to kids like that. -Who the hell are you? I'm a winner.
translation.zh: 你不能那样跟孩子们说话 你到底算老几？我是赢家

translation.en: -Oh my God. -Yeah? You want rainbows and bluebells?
Well, get her in the art club. Now, excuse me. I’m coaching a team.
translation.zh:
带她去艺术俱乐部吧
不好意思 我在执教球队呢

translation.en: Okay, yeah. You're a rude man.
translation.zh: 好吧 是啊 你是一个无礼的人

translation.en: -Don't turn your back on me. -Get off.
I said, don't turn your back on me!
translation.zh: 我说了 不要背对着我！

translation.en: Give me an excuse to put you down.
translation.zh: 给我一个把你放倒的理由

translation.en: -Nah, you're not worth it. -Yeah, I thought so.
translation.zh:
-算了 你不值得我动手
-我就知道

translation.en: -Wait in the car, please. -Oh, here we go.
-I don't want you around my children. -Oh, Eddie, come on. The guy was a bully.
translation.zh:
-我不希望你和我的孩子们在一起
-拜托 那家伙就是恶霸

translation.en: -You don't get it, do you? -No. Obviously I don't. No.
translation.zh:
-你还是不明白 是吧？
-是啊 显然如此
然后是克莱尔 现在是乔
死亡跟随着你 玛雅

translation.en: You sure you've only had that one drink?
translation.zh: 你确定只喝了那一瓶吗？

translation.en: You think I wasn't torn in half when my sister died?
translation.zh:
你以为我姐姐死的时候
我没有伤心欲绝吗？

translation.en: I wasn't even here, Eddie. They're her kids.
translation.zh:
我甚至不在这里
爱迪 他们是她的孩子

translation.en: -They're all I have left of her. -Stay away.
translation.zh:
-我只剩下他们了
-你离远点吧

translation.en: -No, you can't do that! -You stay the fuck away!
translation.zh:
-你不能那样做！
-你他妈的离我们远点！

translation.en: So, I spoke with Sharon about the dress.
translation.zh: 我跟莎伦聊了裙子的事

translation.en: She said that this little fella will definitely show,
translation.zh: 她说这个小家伙肯定会显露出来的

translation.en: but she said she can do some kind of,
I don't know, frill thing to conceal it a bit.
translation.zh: 我也不太懂 做一些饰边来遮掩

translation.en: But everyone attending knows that you're pregnant, so…
translation.zh: 但参加婚礼的人都知道你怀孕了
那是我们的婚礼 萨米

translation.en: I want to look the blushing bride… -[sighs] -…not like we're dashing down the aisle
translation.zh:
我希望自己看起来像是害羞的新娘
而不是因为意外中招

translation.en: because you managed to slip one past the goalie.
Plus, they gave me a partner.
translation.zh: 而且他们给我安排了一个搭档

translation.en: He's about three. A health nut.
translation.zh: 他很幼稚 还爱养生

translation.en: Duran Duran came on the radio. He'd never even heard of them.
translation.zh:
广播播出杜兰·杜兰乐队的歌
他甚至都没听过他们
从没听说过杜兰·杜兰乐队吗？

translation.en: I'm not saying he should like them, not saying he should recite their lyrics,
translation.zh:
我不是说他应该喜欢他们
也不是说他应该会背他们的歌词

translation.en: but he never even heard of them.
No, I agree. He should be fired immediately.
translation.zh: 不 我同意 应该立刻开除他

translation.en: Come here, you big, daft bugger.

translation.zh: 这只是份工作 萨米

translation.en: An important job, but a job nonetheless.
translation.zh: 是很重要的工作 但也只是工作而已
是 不用 我跟他说了

translation.en: Yo. It's Marty. I've, um, just sent you the ballistics report
translation.zh:
我是马蒂
害死乔·伯克特的子弹弹道报告

translation.en: on the bullets that killed Joe Burkett. Have you got it?
translation.zh: 我刚发给你了 收到了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. You're not going to believe your eyes.
translation.zh: 是啊 你肯定无法相信自己的眼睛吧

translation.en: BULLETS MATCH THOSE FROM A 9MM GLOCK 17 4TH GEN
translation.zh:
（子弹与9毫米口径
第四代格洛克17型手枪一致）

translation.en: -[Shane] Who wants a hot dog? -[Maya] Shane, got you this.
translation.zh:
-好了 谁想吃热狗？
-谢恩 给你带了酒

translation.en: -[Shane] Beer! -There you go. Here you are, Bono.
-Thank you. -When's your next tour kicking off?
translation.zh:
-谢谢
-你下次去执行任务是什么时候？

translation.en: Gotta say, I'm glad you're not going back there.
translation.zh: 必须要说 我很高兴你不用再回去了

translation.en: Although if it wasn't for you, Brian wouldn't be here. So…
translation.zh:
如果不是因为你
本就不会在这里 所以…

translation.en: -[clinks] -Not sure whether that's a good thing.
-I know what you're gonna do. -No? -Mm, yeah! -[bottle clinking]
translation.zh:
-我知道你要做什么
-不要吗？要的！

translation.en: -Come on in. Gather in. -[Maya] I hate when he does this.
-Yes. Well, I wanted to thank you… -[chuckles]
…for having us bunch of degenerates over at your humble palace, maybe?
translation.zh:
让我们这群恶棍
来到你的简陋的宫殿 是吧？

translation.en: And I think I speak for everybody when I say…
translation.zh: 我想我能代表所有人说

translation.en: [breathes deeply] …we've missed you loads, little sister.
translation.zh: 我们很想你 小妹妹

translation.en: -Oh, for God's sake, stop it! -Okay, okay, okay.
-To Maya… -Sit down. -…the best combat copter pilot I've ever flown with, our Captain.
translation.zh:
敬玛雅 我共事过的最牛的
战斗直升机飞行员 我们的机长

translation.en: [Maya sighs in relief] Cheers. You okay?
You. You're treating me like a widow.
translation.zh: 不要把我当成寡妇对待

translation.en: Maya, I hate to break it to you, but that's exactly what you are.
translation.zh: 我不想打击你 但你的情况就是如此

translation.en: Which is convenient, really, because you've always suited black.
translation.zh: 倒是也方便了 因为你很适合穿黑色

translation.en: I know this is going to sound crazy, Shane.
translation.zh: 我知道这听起来很疯狂 谢恩

translation.en: But I keep thinking that I'm seeing him.
translation.zh: 但我一直觉得我在看见他

translation.en: People do this all the time.
When you lose someone, it's like…
I dunno. It's like you still want them to be there, you know?
translation.zh:
我也说不好
你会希望他们还在 你知道吗？

translation.en: I'm going to sound even crazier now when I tell you this.
translation.zh: 我要告诉你的事 会显得我更疯狂

translation.en: I think I'm being followed. By who?
I've seen the same car twice.
translation.zh: 同一辆车 我见过两次

translation.en: I've noted down the plate. It's a red Volkswagen.
translation.zh:
我记下车牌号了
是一辆红色的大众汽车

translation.en: -Do you think you can find the owner? -[sighs] Not legally.
translation.zh:
你能找到车主吗？ -通过合法手段不行
-是啊 但你可以

-通过合法手段不行
-是啊 但你可以

translation.en: Maya, what happened? Izabella's saying she won't work for you anymore.
translation.zh:
玛雅 发生什么事了？
伊莎贝拉说她不会再为你工作了

translation.en: Right, well, don't let her leave. I'll come over now, yeah? Keep her there.
translation.zh:
别让她离开
我现在就过去 好吗？把她留在那里

translation.en: -Izabella! What'd you do with the SD card? -Fuck you. She's scared of you!
translation.zh:
伊莎贝拉！你把SD卡拿走做什么了？ -她怕你！
-让我过去 不然我发誓…

translation.en: Let me past, or I swear to God--
translation.zh:
-她怕你！
-让我过去 不然我发誓…

translation.en: -Leave her alone. -I just need to talk to her about Joe.
translation.zh:
-别碰她
-我只是要跟她谈谈乔的事

-别碰她
-她他妈朝我喷胡椒喷雾！

translation.en: Why did you let her leave?
What was I supposed to do? Keep her prisoner?
translation.zh: 不然怎么办？把她关起来吗？

translation.en: I needed to speak with her, Judith.
translation.zh: 我需要跟她谈谈 朱迪丝

translation.en: -I didn't attack her. -You laid hands on her?

translation.zh:
-是的
-那有什么区别呢 玛雅？

translation.en: -Why did you do that? -Why was she here?
translation.zh:
-你为什么要那么做？
-她怎么会来这里？

translation.en: Well, her family has been employed by ours for many years.
translation.zh: 她的家庭受雇于我们家很多年了

translation.en: -Long before you came. -Oh, so you believe her?
translation.zh:
-比你嫁来还早
-所以你相信她？

translation.en: Does it matter that I was married to your son?
Does it matter that I'm the mother of your grandchild?
translation.zh: 我是你孙女的母亲重要吗？

translation.en: She says she caught you spying.
translation.zh: 她说她发现你在监视她

translation.en: And did she tell you what I saw?
translation.zh: 她告诉你我看到什么了吗？
我看到乔了 朱迪丝

translation.en: I don't know how, but that's what I saw.
translation.zh: 我不知道怎么回事 但我看到他了

translation.en: How can a dead man appear on a secret camera?
translation.zh:
一个死人怎么会
出现在隐藏摄像头里？

translation.en: How can-- How can a dead man cuddle his own daughter?
translation.zh: 一个死人怎么会抱自己的女儿？

translation.en: Now, you know that can't be true.
translation.zh: 你知道那不可能是真的

translation.en: -And then you started accusing Izabella. -It wasn't a vision, Judith. He was there.
translation.zh:
-然后你开始指责伊莎贝拉
-那不是幻象 朱迪丝 他就在那里
玛雅 那是你的潜意识
别他妈分析我 朱迪丝

translation.en: -Please don't swear in my home. -I know what I saw.
translation.zh:
-请不要在我家说脏话
-我知道我看到了什么

translation.en: What, my dead son whom we buried?
translation.zh: 我们埋葬的我死去的儿子？

translation.en: I'm going to tell you the truth now, Maya. I'm worried about you.
translation.zh: 我要告诉你真相 玛雅 我很担心你

translation.en: All those things you went through when you were abroad.
translation.zh: 你在国外经历的那些事

-我没事
-你从来没有去解决问题

translation.en: -Are you saying I'm going mad? -No, I'm saying you never dealt with them.
translation.zh:
-你是说我疯了吗？
-我是说你从来没有去解决问题

translation.en: And if I'm to be brutally honest,
translation.zh: 如果要我对你直言不讳

translation.en: I wonder whether you are in a fit state to be looking after that little girl right now.
translation.zh:
我怀疑你现在的状态
是否适合照顾你的女儿

translation.en: Don't you dare question my parenting.
translation.zh: 少来质疑我的教养方式

translation.en: Simple question. My son, did you love him?
translation.zh: 简单的问题 我的儿子 你爱他吗？

translation.en: Because I did, to my core.
But sometimes, when you were together--
translation.zh: 但有时候 你们在一起的时候…

translation.en: was there a voice in his ear,
translation.zh: 在他耳边 有没有一个声音

translation.en: "Was she really good enough for my special boy?"
translation.zh: 她真配得上我的宝贝儿子吗？”

translation.en: Because I'm not one of you.
translation.zh: 因为我不是你们的一员

translation.en: We're just having a bit of a barbecue.
Maya, the, um, 9-millimeter bullets we recovered from your husband's body,
translation.zh:
玛雅 针对从你丈夫身上
找到的9毫米子弹

translation.en: we ran them through ballistics to see if the bullets matched
translation.zh: 我们做了弹道测试 来看看子弹是否

translation.en: any of the cases on our database.
translation.zh: 与数据库里的记录匹配

translation.en: The gun that killed your husband…
-was also used to kill your sister… -[eerie music playing]
translation.zh: 跟杀死你姐姐克莱尔·沃克的枪
